item.title: Glenmark-AbbVie Deal Lifts Optimism on India’s Biotech Stocks
item.description: Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd.’s licensing pact with AbbVie Inc. for its blood cancer drug is boosting optimism over Indian biotechnology stocks, with some brokerages calling it the largest such deal i
